Class AnimationLoader

java.lang.Object
io.mygame.common.AnimationLoader
public class AnimationLoader extends Object
The AnimationLoader class loads a sprite sheet and manages character animations for different movement states (idle, walking) and directions (front, right, left, back). It splits the sprite sheet into frames and provides methods to switch and retrieve the current animation. The constructor initializes animations from the provided sprite sheet path.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    AnimationLoader(String path)
    Constructor that initializes the AnimationLoader with the given path and calls the loadSprite method to load animations.
